A

AbstractFx - class mdes.slick.animation.fx.AbstractFx.
A base Fx class that is used by most tweened animation Fx.
AbstractFx(int, Easing) - Constructor for class mdes.slick.animation.fx.AbstractFx
Creates an AbstractFx with the specified duration and easing.
AlphaEntity - interface mdes.slick.animation.entity.AlphaEntity.
An interface that defines an entity that can be translucent and animated.
AlphaFx - class mdes.slick.animation.fx.AlphaFx.
A fade animation that affects the specified AlphaEntity.
AlphaFx(int, AlphaEntity, float, float, Easing) - Constructor for class mdes.slick.animation.fx.AlphaFx
Creates a new instance of AlphaFx with the specified parameters.
AlphaFx(int, AlphaEntity, float, Easing) - Constructor for class mdes.slick.animation.fx.AlphaFx
Creates a new instance of AlphaFx with the specified parameters and the start at the entity's current alpha (through getAlpha).
AnimationAlpha - class mdes.slick.animation.entity.renderable.AnimationAlpha.
A helper class for creating a RenderableAlpha from an Animation.
AnimationAlpha(Animation) - Constructor for class mdes.slick.animation.entity.renderable.AnimationAlpha
Creates a new instance of this class with the specified animation.
add(Fx) - Method in class mdes.slick.animation.Timeline
Adds the specified Fx to this Timeline.
animate(int) - Method in class mdes.slick.animation.Fx
Animates this Fx with the specified current time (ticks).
